claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Karl Anthony Malone  (  born July 24 , 1963  )  is an American retired professional basketball player .

claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nicknamed `` The Mailman '' , Malone played the power forward position and spent his first 18 seasons  (  1985 -- 2003  )  in the National Basketball Association  (  NBA  )  with the Utah Jazz and formed a formidable duo with his teammate John Stockton .

claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He scored the second most career points in NBA history  (  36,928  )   (  second behind Kareem Abdul-Jabbar  )  , and holds the records for most free throws attempted and made , in addition to co-holding the record for the most first team All-NBA elections in history  (  tied with Kobe Bryant and LeBron James  )  .

claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After retiring from the NBA , Malone joined the staff of the Louisiana Tech Bulldogs basketball team in 2007 and was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 2010  (  twice -- for his individual career , and as a member of the 1992 United States men 's Olympic basketball team  )  .

claim: Karl Malone is nicknamed The Mailman, given to him by his teammates.
premise_source_doc_sentence: 14 players have won the award playing for the team that hosted the All-Star Game : Macauley  (  1951  )  , Cousy  (  1957  )  , Pettit  (  1958 , 1962  )  , Chamberlain  (  1960  )  , Adrian Smith  (  1966  )  , Rick Barry  (  1967  )  , Jerry West  (  1972  )  , Tom Chambers  (  1987  )  , Jordan  (  1988  )  , Karl Malone  (  1993  )  , John Stockton  (  1993  )  , O'Neal  (  2004 , 2009  )  , Bryant  (  2011  )  and Davis  (  2017  )  ; Pettit and O'Neal did this multiple times .
